content: Handmade portrait of the Bitcoin CEO  The portrait is made from the natural wood grains of 1,402 pixels of Australian Blackwood and Tasmanian Oak tiles. It is mounted in a solid frame of Australian cedar.Dimensions: W: 280mm x H: 330mm x D: 12mmhttps://i.imgur.com/jcWxnGv.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/PfWntI9.pnghttps://i.imgur.com/pzgF7BE.pngsorry don't know how to link images so they don't fill the screenimages: https://imgur.com/a/4P3qcNythank you, please let me know if you have any questionsAUCTION TERMSBid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.005 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.0005 BTCAuction End Time: Thursday, 6 April 2023 at 4:00:00 pm AEST  countdown clock: timeanddate countdownSniping:  No sniping. 10 minute standard sniping rule.Shipping: Paid for by buyer. Ships from Australia. Buyer responsible for any and all customs/duties Postage calculator (sent from postcode 2000): australia post shipping calculatorPayment Address: bc1qe4egfvlndyca6hzxw4u5ful8744hfp8w422uny (happy to use escrow but you cover fees)Payment Due: Within 24 hoursEscrow: yes at cost of buyer
